channel.title: Comments on: Rants about Connect
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Tahir Khalid
item.dc:creator: Tahir Khalid
item.content:encoded:
Yes it is very hit and miss…great when you do stumble across a solution on connect (workarounds)…that is usually not provided by MS otherwise it leaves a lot to be desired.

Much like the Microsoft Community pages you get the odd feedback like “Can’t reproduce” and then that’s the end of that, not very useful at all.

I can imagine it must be hard to filter the information but that shouldn’t be hard to focus a little if you design the site in the form of a questionnaire, much like most proper support systems to so you capture what is import and filter out any noise….mostly.

item.title: By: philhege
item.dc:creator: philhege
item.content:encoded:
Ah, Connect. Where good ideas go to die.

http://simoncropp.com/thefailurethatismicrosoftconnect
